main event: Civilian observer reported seeing a saucer-shaped unidentified object with alternating white/blue and intense blue lights over Barstow, California on September 15, 1967.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about the size of two small airplanes.
The object was observed for about 7 minutes before slowly moving to the south of Barstow.
The observer used binoculars to observe the object, which had no associated sound.
The Air Force checked with various agencies but could not verify any distressed or missing aircraft in the area at the time.
The observer reported seeing the same or similar objects several times over a weekly period, with the objects traveling from east to west and west to east.
sighted object: saucer-shaped object with alternating white/blue and intense blue lights
